mapper.select: SELECT groupName, leaderAccount, reportFlag, startDate, endDate, location, organizerAccount FROM `groups`
SELECT groupName FROM `groups` WHERE deleteFlag = 0 AND reportFlag = 1

SELECT g.groupName, COUNT(u.userId) AS memberCount, g.reportFlag, (SELECT u.userName FROM users u WHERE u.account = g.leaderAccount ) AS leaderName, GROUP_CONCAT(u.userName ORDER BY u.userName) AS userList FROM `groups` g LEFT JOIN users u ON g.groupName = u.groupName AND u.deleteFlag = 0 WHERE g.deleteFlag = 0 GROUP BY g.groupName, g.leaderAccount, g.reportFlag
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
mapper.update: UPDATE `groups` SET deleteFlag = 1, updateDate = now() WHERE groupName = #{groupName}
mapper.insert: insert into `groups` (inputDate, updateDate, groupName, leaderAccount, deleteFlag, reportFlag) values (now(), now(), #{groupName}, #{leaderAccount}, #{deleteFlag}, #{reportFlag})
